metadata.title: La Perouse: physical and chemical data
metadata.description: Long term monitoring program of physical oceanographic properties at La Perouse Bank, including some sites along the west coast of Vancouver Island (Nootka Sound, Barkley Sound, Brooks Peninsula).
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Supports scientific and environmental research.

Supplemental Information: Custom software is available for use with this dataset.

Status: In Work

Maintenance frequency: As needed

Access constraints: Departmental

Use constraints: None

Distribution liability: These data are provided "as-is".
